sqlMap.statement:
SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD AS COA_CMPY_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_CMPY_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_CMPY_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_CMPY CM
, COA_CMPY CM
WHERE CM.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CM.COA_CMPY_CD(+) AND CM.COA_CMPY_CD IS NULL AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CM.COA_CMPY_CD AS COA_CMPY_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_CMPY_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_CMPY_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT ,CM.COA_CMPY_SORT_NUM AS COA_CMPY_SORT_NUM FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_CMPY CM
, COA_CMPY CM
WHERE CM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CM.EZCANCELFLAG = '1' AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CM.COA_CMPY_CD AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT CM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CM.COA_CMPY_CD AS COA_CMPY_CD FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_CMPY CM
, COA_CMPY CM
WHERE CM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CM.COA_CMPY_CD = IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD(+) AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID(+) = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM(+) = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG(+) = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG(+) = #smryFlg# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM IS NULL

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD AS COA_BR_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_BR_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_BR_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_BR CB
, COA_BR CB
WHERE CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CB.COA_BR_CD(+) AND CB.COA_BR_CD IS NULL AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CB.COA_BR_CD AS COA_BR_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_BR_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_BR_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT ,CB.COA_BR_SORT_NUM AS COA_BR_SORT_NUM FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_BR CB
, COA_BR CB
WHERE CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CB.EZCANCELFLAG = '1' AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CB.COA_BR_CD AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CB.COA_BR_CD AS COA_BR_CD FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_BR CB
, COA_BR CB
WHERE CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CB.COA_BR_CD = IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD(+) AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID(+) = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM(+) = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG(+) = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG(+) = #smryFlg# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM IS NULL

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD AS COA_CC_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_CC_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_CC_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_CC CC
, COA_CC CC
WHERE CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CC.COA_CC_CD(+) AND CC.COA_CC_CD IS NULL AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CC.COA_CC_CD AS COA_CC_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_CC_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_CC_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT ,CC.COA_CC_SORT_NUM AS COA_CC_SORT_NUM FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_CC CC
, COA_CC CC
WHERE CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CC.EZCANCELFLAG = '1' AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CC.COA_CC_CD AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CC.COA_CC_CD AS COA_CC_CD FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_CC CC
, COA_CC CC
WHERE CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CC.COA_CC_CD = IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD(+) AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID(+) = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM(+) = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG(+) = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG(+) = #smryFlg# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM IS NULL

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD AS COA_ACCT_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_ACCT_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_ACCT_DESC_TXT ,'Y' AS FRONT_ENTRY_FLG ,'Y' AS CC_EXP_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT ,'N' AS COA_ACRL_FLG FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_ACCT CA
, COA_ACCT CA
WHERE CA.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CA.COA_ACCT_CD(+) AND CA.COA_ACCT_CD IS NULL AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CA.COA_ACCT_CD AS COA_ACCT_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_ACCT_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_ACCT_DESC_TXT ,'Y' AS FRONT_ENTRY_FLG ,'Y' AS CC_EXP_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT ,'N' AS COA_ACRL_FLG ,CA.COA_ACCT_SORT_NUM AS COA_ACCT_SORT_NUM FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_ACCT CA
, COA_ACCT CA
WHERE CA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CA.EZCANCELFLAG = '1' AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CA.COA_ACCT_CD AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT CA.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CA.COA_ACCT_CD AS COA_ACCT_CD FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_ACCT CA
, COA_ACCT CA
WHERE CA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CA.COA_ACCT_CD = IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD(+) AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID(+) = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM(+) = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG(+) = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG(+) = #smryFlg# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM IS NULL

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD AS COA_PROD_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_PROD_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_PROD_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_PROD CP
, COA_PROD CP
WHERE CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CP.COA_PROD_CD(+) AND CP.COA_PROD_CD IS NULL AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CP.COA_PROD_CD AS COA_PROD_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_PROD_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_PROD_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT ,CP.COA_PROD_SORT_NUM AS COA_PROD_SORT_NUM FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_PROD CP
, COA_PROD CP
WHERE CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CP.EZCANCELFLAG = '1' AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CP.COA_PROD_CD AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CP.COA_PROD_CD AS COA_PROD_CD FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_PROD CP
, COA_PROD CP
WHERE CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CP.COA_PROD_CD = IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD(+) AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID(+) = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM(+) = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG(+) = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG(+) = #smryFlg# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM IS NULL

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD AS COA_CH_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_CH_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_CH_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_CH CC
, COA_CH CC
WHERE CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CC.COA_CH_CD(+) AND CC.COA_CH_CD IS NULL AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CC.COA_CH_CD AS COA_CH_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_CH_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_CH_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT ,CC.COA_CH_SORT_NUM AS COA_CH_SORT_NUM FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_CH CC
, COA_CH CC
WHERE CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CC.EZCANCELFLAG = '1' AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CC.COA_CH_CD AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CC.COA_CH_CD AS COA_CH_CD FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_CH CC
, COA_CH CC
WHERE CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CC.COA_CH_CD = IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD(+) AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID(+) = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM(+) = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG(+) = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG(+) = #smryFlg# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM IS NULL

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD AS COA_AFFL_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_AFFL_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_AFFL_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_AFFL CA
, COA_AFFL CA
WHERE CA.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CA.COA_AFFL_CD(+) AND CA.COA_AFFL_CD IS NULL AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CA.COA_AFFL_CD AS COA_AFFL_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_AFFL_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_AFFL_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT ,CA.COA_AFFL_SORT_NUM AS COA_AFFL_SORT_NUM FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_AFFL CA
, COA_AFFL CA
WHERE CA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CA.EZCANCELFLAG = '1' AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CA.COA_AFFL_CD AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT CA.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CA.COA_AFFL_CD AS COA_AFFL_CD FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_AFFL CA
, COA_AFFL CA
WHERE CA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CA.COA_AFFL_CD = IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD(+) AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID(+) = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM(+) = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG(+) = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG(+) = #smryFlg# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM IS NULL

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD, 3, 2) AS COA_PROJ_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_PROJ_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_PROJ_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_PROJ CP
, COA_PROJ CP
WHERE CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND SUBSTR(IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD, 3, 2) = CP.COA_PROJ_CD(+) AND CP.COA_PROJ_CD IS NULL AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD LIKE '00%' AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CP.COA_PROJ_CD AS COA_PROJ_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_PROJ_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_PROJ_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT ,CP.COA_PROJ_SORT_NUM AS COA_PROJ_SORT_NUM FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_PROJ CP
, COA_PROJ CP
WHERE CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CP.EZCANCELFLAG = '1' AND SUBSTR(IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD, 3, 2) = CP.COA_PROJ_CD AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD LIKE '00%' AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CP.COA_PROJ_CD AS COA_PROJ_CD FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_PROJ CP
, COA_PROJ CP
WHERE CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CP.COA_PROJ_CD = SUBSTR(IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD(+), 3, 2) AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID(+) = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM(+) = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG(+) = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG(+) = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD(+) LIKE '00%'
AND IF.COA_SEG_NM IS NULL

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD AS COA_EXTN_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_EXTN_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_EXTN_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_EXTN CE
, COA_EXTN CE
WHERE CE.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CE.COA_EXTN_CD(+) AND CE.COA_EXTN_CD IS NULL AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT #glblCmpyCd# AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CE.COA_EXTN_CD AS COA_EXTN_CD ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenNm#) AS COA_EXTN_NM ,SUBSTR(IF.COA_DESC_TXT, 1, #maxLenDesc#) AS COA_EXTN_DESC_TXT ,NVL(IF.COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_PSTG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_BDG_ALLW_FLG ,NVL(IF.COA_ENBL_FLG, 'Y') AS COA_ENBL_FLG ,IF.COA_START_ACTV_DT AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,IF.COA_END_ACTV_DT AS COA_END_ACTV_DT ,CE.COA_EXTN_SORT_NUM AS COA_EXTN_SORT_NUM FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_EXTN CE
, COA_EXTN CE
WHERE CE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CE.EZCANCELFLAG = '1' AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD = CE.COA_EXTN_CD AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG = #smryFlg#
AND IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#

SELECT CE.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,CE.COA_EXTN_CD AS COA_EXTN_CD FROM NMAI0020_01 IF
, PRNT_COA_EXTN CE
, COA_EXTN CE
WHERE CE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CE.COA_EXTN_CD = IF.COA_FLEX_VAL_CD(+) AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID(+) = #transactionId# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM(+) = #coaSegNm# AND IF.COA_ENBL_FLG(+) = #yOrN# AND IF.COA_SMRY_FLG(+) = #smryFlg# AND IF.COA_SEG_NM IS NULL

SELECT AC.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,AC.COA_ACCT_CD ,GC.COA_GL_CMBN_TP_CD AS TRIAL_BAL_TP_CD FROM COA_ACCT AC ,(SELECT COA_ACCT_CD ,MAX(COA_GL_CMBN_TP_CD) AS COA_GL_CMBN_TP_CD FROM COA_GL_CMBN WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' GROUP BY COA_ACCT_CD ) GC WHERE AC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AC.TRIAL_BAL_TP_CD IS NULL AND AC.COA_ACCT_CD = GC.COA_ACCT_CD

SELECT INTERFACE_ID, TRANSACTION_ID, SEGMENT_ID, UNIT_ID, SEQ_NUMBER, COA_SEG_NM, COA_FLEX_VAL_CD, COA_DESC_TXT, COA_ENBL_FLG, COA_SMRY_FLG, COA_END_ACTV_TS, COA_CRAT_TS, COA_LAST_UPD_TS, COA_FLEX_VAL_SET_ID, COA_FLEX_VAL_ID FROM NMAI0020_01 WHERE TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND COA_FLEX_VAL_SET_ID = #coaFlexValSetId# AND COA_ENBL_FLG = #yOrN#
AND COA_FLEX_VAL_CD <> #defaultCode#
ORDER BY COA_FLEX_VAL_CD
SELECT TRANSACTION_ID FROM NMAI0020_01 WHERE TRANSACTION_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY TRANSACTION_ID
